snippet: Apple’s latest iPhones are available only in black or white, but some owners are replacing the front and back panels with colorful and unauthorized alternatives.
abstract: Apple’s latest iPhones are available only in black or white, but some owners are replacing the front and back panels with colorful and unauthorized alternatives; Apple does not condone modifications and may refuse to service or repair a phone if it has been tampered with but those who do so say the trouble is worth it.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s latest iPhones are available only in black or white, but some owners are replacing the front and back panels with colorful and unauthorized alternatives.

headline.seo: Dressing Up the iPhone’s Dull Uniform
headline.main: Rebellious Tinkerers Dress Up the iPhone’s Uniform
headline.print_headline: Rebellious Tinkerers Dress Up the iPhone’s Uniform
